i1.name: Royal Privilege
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Qiyana's''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[ability|abilities]] deal {{as|{{pp|15 to 83}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to affected enemies.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
''Royal Privilege's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset on all targets upon changing an {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and damaging ability deal 15undefined âˆ’ 83undefined (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) bonus physical damage to affected enemies.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Royal Privilege's cooldown is reset on all targets upon changing an Element.
i1.notes:
* ''Royal Privilege's'' trigger from a basic attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (bonus damage is negated and the on-target cooldown does not apply).
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Royal Privelege's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Edge of Ixtal
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' slashes forward in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.
Upon gathering an element with {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}, ''Edge of Ixtal'' is upgraded to ''Elemental Wrath'' and its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.
Upon gathering an element with Terrashape, Edge of Ixtal is upgraded to Elemental Wrath and its cooldown is reset.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 160}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|60*0.75 to 160*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{fd|67.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes: * ''Edge of Ixtal'' will cast from wherever '''Qiyana''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 67.5% bonus AD)

q2.name: Elemental Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' consumes her current ''Element'' and {{tip|projectile|hurls}} her blade in the target direction, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and triggering a bonus effect based on the consumed ''Element''.
Enemies struck by the blade are dealt {{as|physical damage}}, reduced to 75% against subsequent units beyond the closest.

{{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}:}} The blade raises a ''grass trail'' behind '''Qiyana''' that travels forth, lasting for {{fd|3.5}} seconds and granting '''Qiyana''' {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until she attacks, casts an ability other than {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}, or exits the trail.
{{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}:}} {{tip|root|Roots}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, then {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20% for 1 second.
{{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}:}} Enemies hit while below {{sti|{{as|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} are dealt {{ccs|'''bonus''' damage|physical}}.
q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana consumes her current Element and hurls her blade in the target direction, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and triggering a bonus effect based on the consumed Element.
Enemies struck by the blade are dealt physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent units beyond the closest.
Unknown value: cci Terrashape Brush.png Brush: The blade raises a grass trail behind Qiyana that travels forth, lasting for 3.5 seconds and granting Qiyana invisibility and 20% bonus movement speed until she attacks, casts an ability other than Terrashape, or exits the trail.
Unknown value: cci Terrashape River.png River: Roots enemies hit for 0.5 seconds, then slows them by 20% for 1 second.
Unknown value: cci Terrashape Rock.png Terrain: Enemies hit while below 50% of their maximum health are dealt Unknown value: ccs bonus damage physical.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 160}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|60*0.75 to 160*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.75}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q2.notes: * ''Elemental Wrath'' will cast from wherever '''Qiyana''' is at the end of the cast time.
q2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 35,35,35,35,35 as 35
q2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '7,7,7,7,7' as '7'

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

• Bonus Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage to targets beyond the first: (+ % bonus AD)

st_slices: Total Damage to targets beyond the first

w1.name: Terrashape
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While holding an ''Element'', '''Qiyana''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' attack range}}, {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while moving near the ''Element'' currently being held.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target location while gathering an ''Element'' of the nearest {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}}, {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} she targeted, enchanting her blade.
''A target Element is required to cast this ability''.
Once ''Terrashape'' has been learned, '''Qiyana''' is automatically given the {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} element upon [[Death|respawning]].
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains bonus attack speed, 25 bonus attack range, bonus magic damage on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and Combat status bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.
Active: Qiyana dashes towards the target location while gathering an Element of the nearest Unknown value: cci Terrashape Brush.png Brush, Unknown value: cci Terrashape River.png River or Unknown value: cci Terrashape Rock.png Terrain she targeted, enchanting her blade.
A target Element is required to cast this ability.
Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the Unknown value: cci Terrashape Rock.png Terrain element upon Death.
w1.notes:
* ''Terrashape'' does not interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* The water puddles formed by the {{ui|Ocean Drake|Ocean Rift}} on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} count as valid terrain for obtaining the {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} element.
* The {{tip|brush|brushes}} grown by {{cai|Brushmaker|Ivern}} count for gathering the {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} element.
* '''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during the {{tip|dash}}.
* Passive bonus damage from basic attacks can be {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: Passive bonus damage interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 45% AP)

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Audacity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} if they are still in range upon arrival.
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Audacity''. Casting {{ai|Edge of Ixtal|Qiyana}} while ''Audacity'' is targeting a champion will autonomously aim at them.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.
Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Audacity. Casting Edge of Ixtal while Audacity is targeting a champion will autonomously aim at them.
e1.notes:
* ''Audacity'' only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.
* {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}} will interrupt ''Audacity's'' dash.

r1.name: Supreme Display of Talent
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' sends a ''windblast'' in the target direction that {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all enemies within its path and stops upon hitting {{as|terrain}}.

The ''windblast'' then creates an erupting shockwave across any {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} it passes through, as well as around the borders of {{as|terrain}} it reaches, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, with the percentage damage capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|changedisplay=true|type=proximity|0.5;1|0;X}} seconds, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area along its path each for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target direction that knocks back all enemies within its path and stops upon hitting terrain.
The windblast then creates an erupting shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, with the percentage damage capped against monsters, stunning them for 0;X â€’ undefined seconds, and granting sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 170% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Capped percentage damage|{{ap|500 to 1000}}}}
r1.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
* Artificial terrain (e.g, {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain. The shockwave's path is determined once it initially spreads; any expired terrain will be treated as if it were still there.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile-intercepting}} effects will block the windblast but not the shockwave.
* ''Supreme Display of Talent'' will cast from wherever '''Qiyana''' is at the end of the cast time.

• Physical Damage: (+ 170% bonus AD) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)
